QuestData.Title: Victory in Wintergrasp
QuestData.Description: Commander Zanneth might be satisfied with a pile of Horde corpses at his feet, but controlling Wintergrasp is of the utmost importance to the Valiance Expedition. Make sure it remains in our control.$B$BHowever, don't think we'll just let you stand around while your allies do your dirty work for you. If you're not at least a second level recruit by the end of the battle, don't come back.
QuestData.LogDescription: Win a Wintergrasp battleground match and return to Tactical Officer Abrahmis in Wintergrasp. You must have participated in the battle to be credited for the victory.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Tactical Officer Ahbramis in Wintergrasp.
QuestData.CompletionText: Do you bring word of victory?
QuestData.RewardText: Just what I wanted to hear! A victory in Lake Wintergrasp - even a temporary one - is crucial to our overall strategy against the Horde.
